## Installing libraries used

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results="hide", eval=FALSE}
packages = c("dplyr","MuMIn","MASS","leaps","glmnet","car")
for (package in packages) {
    install.packages(package)
}
```
